item.description:
This is simply a morning paddle at a nice clean lake without the effect of all the recent flooding found in the rivers.

In addition to a nice morning paddle around the lake, I want to do my rolls, paddle float entry and wet exits right before its time for me to go.
I have some volenteer activity i should attend to and still can if i finish up at 11:00. That means if anyone else wants to stay and paddle with other members or go to another site then I encourage that.
I will bring along an additional recreational kayak with all of the extra acessories..

Directions to Bolton Lake:
Rte 384 East to Bolton.
at the end will meet rte 44 and 6
stay to the left = rte 44
The first light has a small shopping area and a post office on the right, pass that and follow rte 44 to the next light.
A cemetary on the right then a church right before the light.
=Intersection of rte 44 and South rd
Look left a very short distance before the light, this is the boat launch area.
I will have the blue Toyota Avalon with 2 kayaks on an old sailboat trailer.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Morning Paddle at Bolton Lake, Bolton CT
